attributes.action: Invest in and encourage UK agriculture and Food Production for home consumption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Invest in and encourage UK agriculture and Food Production for home consumption

So that we do not have to rely on foreign food imports and suffer foreign trade policy restrictions in order to sustain the food needs of our population

Actively promote subsistence agriculture with increased government funding and support to farmers and food producers. Thus benefiting local economies.

Instead of building on valuable farmland or using it to grow crops to support biofuels we should be using it to support the food needs of our citizens and therefore investing in other transport technologies that do not damage our environment
